verses.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
verses.transliteration: Qad aflahal mu'minoon

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ
verses.translation: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
verses.transliteration: Allazeena hum fee Salaatihim khaashi'oon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: And they who turn away from ill speech
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum 'anillaghwimu'ridoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ
verses.translation: And they who are observant of zakah
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum liz Zakaati faa'iloon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.translation: And they who guard their private parts
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum lifuroo jihim haafizoon

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
verses.transliteration: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aimaanuhum fa innahum ghairu maloomeen

verses.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
verses.transliteration: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
verses.translation: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum li amaanaatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum 'alaa Salawaatihim yuhaafizoon

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
verses.translation: Those are the inheritors
verses.transliteration: Ulaaa'ika humul waarisoon

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.translation: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yarisoonal Firdawsa hum feehaa khaalidoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min sulaalatim minteen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
verses.transliteration: Summa ja'alnaahu nutfatan fee qaraarim makeen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.
verses.transliteration: Summa khalaqnan nutfata 'alaqatan fakhalaqnal 'alaqata mudghatan fakhalaq nal mudghata 'izaaman fakasawnal 'izaama lahman summa anshaanaahu khalqan aakhar; fatabaarakal laahu ahsanul khaaliqeen

segments.arabic: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ
segments.translation: Then We created the semen-drop into a clinging substance then We created the clinging substance into an embryonic lump then We created the embryonic lump into bones then We clothed the bones with flesh then We produce it as a creation another
segments.transliteration: thumma khalaqnā l-nuṭ'fata ʿalaqatan fakhalaqnā l-ʿalaqata muḍ'ghatan fakhalaqnā l-muḍ'ghata ʿiẓāman fakasawnā l-ʿiẓāma laḥman thumma anshanāhu khalqan ākhara

segments.translation: So blessed is Allah the Best of the Creators

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
verses.translation: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
verses.transliteration: Summa innakum ba'da zaalika la maaiyitoon

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تُبْعَثُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
verses.transliteration: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati tub'asoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.translation: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnaa fawqakum sab'a taraaa'iqa wa maa kunnaa 'anil khalqi ghaafileen

verses.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
verses.transliteration: Wa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa-askannaahu fil ardi wa innaa 'alaa zahaabim bihee laqaa diroon

segments.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ
segments.translation: And We send down from the sky water in due measure then We cause it to settle in the earth
segments.transliteration: wa-anzalnā mina l-samāi māan biqadarin fa-askannāhu fī l-arḍi

segments.translation: And indeed, We on taking it away taking it away surely are Able

words.translation: then We cause it to settle

verses.arabic: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
verses.transliteration: Fa anshaanaa lakum bihee Jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naab; lakum feehaa fawaakihu kaseeratunw wa minhaa taakuloon

verses.arabic: وَشَجَرَةً تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍ لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَشَجَرَةً تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍ لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ
verses.translation: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.
verses.transliteration: Wa shajaratan takhruju min Toori Sainaaa'a tambutu bidduhni wa sibghil lil aakileen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihaa wa lakum feehaa manaafi'u kaseeratunw wa minhaa taakuloon

segments.translation: And indeed for you in the cattle surely, is a lesson

segments.arabic: نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
segments.translation: We give you drink from what is in their bellies and for you in them are benefits many and of them you eat
segments.transliteration: nus'qīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihā walakum fīhā manāfiʿu kathīratun wamin'hā takulūna

verses.arabic: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alaihaa wa'alal fulki tuhmaloon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi'budul laaha maa lakum min ilahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon

segments.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ
segments.translation: And verily We sent Nuh to his people and he said O my people Worship Allah not for you is any god other than Him
segments.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi faqāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū l-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu

segments.translation: Then will not you fear

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.
verses.transliteration: Faqaalal mala'ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yureedu ai yatafaddala 'alaikum wa law shaaa'al laahu la anzala malaaa'ikatam maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
verses.transliteration: In huwa illaa rajulum bihee jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihee hattan heen

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.translation: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon

verses.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.translation: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
verses.transliteration: Fa awhainaaa ilaihi anis na'il fulka bi a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa fa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa wa faarat tannooru fasluk feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini wa ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu minhum wa laa tukhaat ibnee fil lazeena zalamooo innaahum mughraqoon

segments.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ
segments.translation: So We inspired to him That construct the ship under Our eyes and Our inspiration then when comes Our Command and gushes forth the oven
segments.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilayhi ani iṣ'naʿi l-ful'ka bi-aʿyuninā wawaḥyinā fa-idhā jāa amrunā wafāra l-tanūru

segments.arabic: فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ
segments.translation: then put into it of every kind of mates two and your family except those has preceded against whom the Word thereof
segments.transliteration: fa-us'luk fīhā min kullin zawjayni ith'nayni wa-ahlaka illā man sabaqa ʿalayhi l-qawlu min'hum

segments.translation: And do not address Me concerning those who wronged
indeed, they are the ones to be drowned

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
verses.transliteration: Fa izas tawaita ata wa mam ma'aka 'alal fulki faqulil hamdu lillaahil lazee najjaanaa minal qawmiz zalimeen

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
verses.transliteration: Wa qur Rabbi anzilnee munzalam mubaarakanw wa Anta khairul munzileen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatinw wa in kunnaa lamubtaleen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
verses.transliteration: Summaa anshaana mim ba'dihim qarnan aakhareen

verses.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
verses.transliteration: Fa arsalnaa feehim Rasoolam minhum ani'budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon

segments.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ
segments.translation: And We sent among them a Messenger from themselves [that] Worship Allah not for you is any god other than Him
segments.transliteration: fa-arsalnā fīhim rasūlan min'hum ani uʿ'budū l-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu

segments.translation: Then will not you fear

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.translation: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal mala-u min qawmihil lazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi liqaaa'il Aakhirati wa atrafnaahum fil hayaatid dunyaa maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yaakulu mimmaa taakuloona minhu wa yashrabu mimmaa tashraboon

words.translation: while We had given them luxury

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.translation: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in at'atum basharam mislakum innakum izal lakhaasiroon

verses.arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
verses.translation: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?
verses.transliteration: A-Ya'idukum annakum izaa mittum wa kuntum turaabanw wa izaaman annakum mukhrajoon

verses.arabic: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.
verses.transliteration: Haihaata haihaata limaa too'adoon

verses.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
verses.translation: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
verses.transliteration: In hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa nahnu bimab'ooseen

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."
verses.transliteration: In huwa illaa rajulunif taraa 'alal laahi kazibanw wa maa nahnuu lahoo bimu'mineen

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon

verses.arabic: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'ammaa qaleelil la yusbihunna naadimeen

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.
verses.transliteration: Fa akhazat humus saihatu bilhaqqi faja'alnaahum ghusaaa'aa; fabu;dal lilqaw miz zaalimeen

segments.translation: So seized them the awful cry in truth and We made them as rubbish of dead leaves
So away with the people the wrongdoers

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We produced after them other generations.
verses.transliteration: Summa anshaanaa mim ba'dihim quroonan aakhareen

verses.arabic: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
verses.translation: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].
verses.transliteration: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.
verses.transliteration: Summa arsalnaa Rusulanaa tatraa kulla maa jaaa'a ummatar Rasooluhaa kazzabooh; fa atba'naa ba'dahum ba'danw wa ja'alnaahum ahaadees; fabu'dal liqawmil laa yu'minoon

segments.translation: Then We sent Our Messengers in succession

segments.arabic: كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ
segments.translation: Every time Every time came to a nation its Messenger they denied him
segments.transliteration: kulla mā jāa ummatan rasūluhā kadhabūhu

segments.translation: so We made them follow some of them others and We made them narrations
So away with a people not they believe

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority
verses.transliteration: Summa arsalnaa Moosaa wa akhaahu Haaroona bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ
verses.translation: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.
verses.transliteration: Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawman 'aaleem

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"
verses.transliteration: Faqaaloo annu'minu libasharaini mislinaa wa qawmuhumaa lanaa 'aabidoon

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
verses.translation: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.
verses.transliteration: Fakazzaboohumaa fakaanoo minal mmuhlakeen

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba la'allahum yahtadoon

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ
verses.translation: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnab na Maryama wa ummahooo aayatannw wa aawainaahumaaa ilaa rabwatin zaati qaraarinw wa ma'een

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.
verses.transliteration: Yaaa aiyuhar Rusulu kuloo minat taiyibaati wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem

segments.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ
segments.translation: O Messengers O Messengers Eat of the good things and do righteous deeds
segments.transliteration: yāayyuhā l-rusulu kulū mina l-ṭayibāti wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan

segments.translation: Indeed, I Am of what you do All-Knower

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.translation: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."
verses.transliteration: Wa inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw wa Ana Rabbukum fattaqoon

verses.arabic: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
verses.translation: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.
verses.transliteration: Fataqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum zuburaa; kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon

segments.translation: But they cut off their affair of unity between them into sects
each faction in what they have rejoicing

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: So leave them in their confusion for a time.
verses.transliteration: Fazarhum fee ghamratihim hattaa heen

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.translation: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
verses.transliteration: A-yahsaboona annnamaa numiduhum bihee mimmaalinw wa baneen

verses.arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.
verses.transliteration: Nusaari'u lahum fil khairaat; bal laa yash'uroon

segments.translation: We hasten to them in the good
Nay not they perceive

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
verses.transliteration: Innal lazeena hum min khashyati Rabbihim mushfiqoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum bi Aayaati Rabbihim yu'minoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum bi Rabbihim laa yushrikoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yu'toona maaa aataw wa quloobuhum wajilatun annahum ilaa Rabbihim raaji'oon

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
verses.translation: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
verses.transliteration: Ulaaa'ika yusaari'oona fil khairaati wa hum lahaa saabiqoon

verses.arabic: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa wa ladainaa kitaabuny yantiqu bilhaqqi w ahum la yuzlamoon

segments.translation: And not We burden any soul except to its capacity
and with Us is a Record which speaks with the truth
and they will not be wronged

verses.arabic: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.translation: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,
verses.transliteration: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratim min haazaa wa lahum a'maalum min dooni zaalika hum lahaa 'aamiloon

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
verses.translation: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa izaaa akhznaa mutrafeehim bil'azaabi izaa hum yaj'aroon

verses.arabic: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
verses.transliteration: Laa taj'arul yawma innakum minnaa laa tunsaroon

segments.translation: Do not cry for help today
Indeed, you from Us not will be helped

verses.arabic: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
verses.translation: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
verses.transliteration: Qad kaanat Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum 'alaaa a'qaabikum tankisoon

verses.arabic: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ
verses.translation: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.
verses.transliteration: Mustakbireena bihee saamiran tahjuroon

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?
verses.transliteration: Afalam yaddabbarrul qawla am jaaa'ahum maa lam yaati aabaaa'ahumul awwaleen

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?
verses.transliteration: Am lam ya'rifoo Rasoolahum fahum lahoo munkiroon

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona bihee jinnnah; bal jaaa'ahum bilhaqqi wa aksaruhum lil haqqi kaarihoon

segments.translation: Or they say In him is madness

segments.arabic: بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
segments.translation: Nay he brought them the truth but most of them to the truth are averse
segments.transliteration: bal jāahum bil-ḥaqi wa-aktharuhum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna

verses.arabic: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.
verses.transliteration: Wa lawit taba'al haqqu ahwaaa'ahum lafasadatis samaawaatu wal ardu wa man feehinnn; bal atainaahum bizikrihim fahum 'an zikrihim mu'ridon

segments.arabic: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ
segments.translation: But if had followed the truth their desires surely would have been corrupted the heavens and the earth and whoever is therein
segments.transliteration: walawi ittabaʿa l-ḥaqu ahwāahum lafasadati l-samāwātu wal-arḍu waman fīhinna

segments.arabic: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
segments.translation: Nay We have brought them their reminder but they from their reminder are turning away
segments.transliteration: bal ataynāhum bidhik'rihim fahum ʿan dhik'rihim muʿ'riḍūna

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.
verses.transliteration: Am tas'aluhum kharjan fakharaaju Rabbika khairunw wa Huwa khairur raaziqeen

segments.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ
segments.translation: Or you ask them for a payment But the payment of your Lord is best
segments.transliteration: am tasaluhum kharjan fakharāju rabbika khayrun

segments.translation: and He is the Best of the Providers

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.
verses.transliteration: Wa innaka latad'oohum ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ
verses.translation: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
verses.transliteration: Wa innnal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati 'anis siraati lanaakiboon

verses.arabic: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.translation: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
verses.transliteration: Wa law rahimnaahum wa kashafnaa maa bihim min durril lalajjoo fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
verses.translation: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad akhaznaahum bil'azaabi famastakaanoo li Rabbihim wa maa yatadarra'oon

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
verses.translation: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa izaa fatahnaa 'alaihim baaban zaa 'azaabin shadeedin izaa hum feehi mublisoon

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal lazeee ansha a-lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon

segments.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ
segments.translation: And He is the One Who produced for you the hearing and the sight and the feeling
segments.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī ansha-a lakumu l-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata

segments.translation: little is what you give thanks

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.translation: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu wa lahukh tilaaful laili wannahaar; afalaa ta'qiloon

segments.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ
segments.translation: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death and for Him is the alternation of the night and the day
segments.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī yuḥ'yī wayumītu walahu ikh'tilāfu al-layli wal-nahāri

segments.translation: Then will not you reason

verses.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.
verses.transliteration: Bal qaaloo misla maa qaalal awwaloon

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'a-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'a-innaa lamab 'oosoon

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."
verses.transliteration: Laqad wu'idnaa nahnu wa aabaaa'unaa haazaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

verses.arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
verses.transliteration: Qul limanil ardu wa man feehaaa in kuntum ta'lamoon

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"
verses.transliteration: Sa-yaqooloona lillaah; qul afalaa tazakkkaroon

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"
verses.transliteration: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaatis sab'i wa Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
verses.transliteration: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul afalaa tattaqoon

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"
verses.transliteration: Qul mam bi yadihee malakootu kulli shai'inw wa Huwa yujeeru wa laa yujaaru 'alaihi in kuntum ta'lamoon

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"
verses.transliteration: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul fa annaa tus haroon

verses.arabic: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.translation: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.
verses.transliteration: Bal atainaahum bil haqqi wa innahum lakaaziboon

verses.arabic: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].
verses.transliteration: Mat takhazal laahu minw waladinw wa maa kaana ma'ahoo min ilaah; izal lazahaba kullu ilaahim bimaa khalaqa wa la'alaa ba'duhum 'alaa ba'd; Subhaannal laahi 'ammaa yasifoon

segments.arabic: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ
segments.translation: Not Allah has taken Allah has taken any son and not is with Him any god
segments.transliteration: mā ittakhadha l-lahu min waladin wamā kāna maʿahu min ilāhin

segments.arabic: إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ
segments.translation: Then surely would have taken away each god what he created and surely would have overpowered some of them [on] others
segments.transliteration: idhan ladhahaba kullu ilāhin bimā khalaqa walaʿalā baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍin

segments.translation: Glory be to Allah above what they attribute

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].
verses.transliteration: 'Aalimil Ghaibi wash shahhaadati fata'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

verses.arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
verses.transliteration: Qur Rabbi immmaa turiyannee maa yoo'adoon

verses.arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."
verses.transliteration: Rabbi falaa taj'alnee fil qawmiz zaalimeen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.
verses.transliteration: Wa innaa 'alaaa an nuriyaka maa na'iduhum laqaadiroon

verses.arabic: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
verses.transliteration: Idfa' billate hiya ahsanus saiyi'ah; nahnu a'lamu bimaa yasifoon

segments.translation: Repel by that which is best the evil
We know best of what they attribute

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
verses.translation: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
verses.transliteration: Wa qur Rabbi a'oozu bika min hamazaatish Shayaateen

verses.arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
verses.translation: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."
verses.transliteration: Wa a'oozu bika Rabbi ai-yahduroon

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
verses.translation: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a ahada humul mawtu qaala Rabbir ji'oon

verses.arabic: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.
verses.transliteration: La'alleee a'malu saalihan feemaa taraktu kallaa; innahaa kalimatun huwa qaaa'iluhaa wa minw waraaa'him barzakhun ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

segments.translation: That I may do righteous deeds in what I left behind
No
Indeed, it is a word he speaks it

segments.arabic: وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
segments.translation: and before them and before them is a barrier till the Day they are resurrected
segments.transliteration: wamin warāihim barzakhun ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.
verses.transliteration: Fa izaa nufikha fis Soori falaaa ansaaba bainahum yawma'izinw wa laa yatasaaa'aloon

verses.arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
verses.transliteration: Faman saqulat mawaazee nuhoo fa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.translation: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
verses.transliteration: Wa man khaffat mawaa zeenuhoo fa ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasiroon anfusahum fee Jahannnama khaalidoon

verses.arabic: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
verses.translation: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
verses.transliteration: Talfahu wujoohahumun Naaru wa hum feehaa kaalihood

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
verses.transliteration: Alam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum bihaa tukazziboon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo Rabbanaa ghalabat 'alainaa shiqwatunaa wa kunnaa qawman daaalleen

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.translation: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa akhrijnaa minhaa fa in 'udnaa fa innaa zaalimoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
verses.translation: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
verses.transliteration: Qaalakh sa'oo feehaa wa laa tukallimoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'
verses.transliteration: Innahoo kaana fareequm min 'ibaadee yaqooloona Rabbanaaa aamannaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa wa Anta khairur raahimeen

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.
verses.transliteration: Fattakhaztumoohum sikhriyyan hattaaa ansawkum zikree wa kuntum minhum tadhakoon

verses.arabic: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."
verses.transliteration: Inee jazaituhumul Yawma bimaa sabarooo annahum humul faaa'izoon

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala kam labistum fil ardi 'adada sineen

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawmin fas'alil 'aaaddeen

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
verses.transliteration: Qaala il labistum illaa qaleelal law annakum kuntum ta'lamoon

segments.translation: He will say Not you stayed but a little
if only you [you] knew

verses.arabic: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"
verses.transliteration: Afahsibtum annamaa khalaqnaakum 'abasanw wa annakum ilainaa laa turja'oon

verses.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.
verses.transliteration: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Kareem

segments.translation: So exalted is Allah the King the Truth

segments.arabic: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
segments.translation: There is no god except Him the Lord of the Throne Honorable
segments.transliteration: lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu l-ʿarshi l-karīmi

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.
verses.transliteration: Wa mai yad'u ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara laa burhaana lahoo bihee fa innnamaa hisaabuhoo 'inda Rabbih; innahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon

segments.arabic: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ
segments.translation: And whoever invokes with Allah god other no proof for him in it Then only his account is with his Lord
segments.transliteration: waman yadʿu maʿa l-lahi ilāhan ākhara lā bur'hāna lahu bihi fa-innamā ḥisābuhu ʿinda rabbihi

segments.translation: Indeed, [he] not will succeed the disbelievers

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.translation: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
verses.transliteration: Wa qur Rabbigh fir warham wa Anta khairur raahimeen
